88caa3d2-bc37-4fd5-8554-774c92719a44.description: This stripe was created to respond to time pressures with clear and compelling demos and presentations that differentiate Zebra solutions from the competition. Self-paced video lessons, practice demos/presentations as well as coaching comprise this experience. Earners now know how to understand the motives of stakeholders, can elevate demos above features and functions, and develop consistency with a repeatable and efficient process. Approximate time to complete this stripe is 6-8 hours.
88caa3d2-bc37-4fd5-8554-774c92719a44.name: SkillsEdge Demo2Win!

fad77147-c3eb-48c2-ad6a-fbf9803e359c.description: Here at Zebra, we collectively represent the “Customer First” culture, and one critical element to representing that culture is ensuring a consistent customer experience across all customer-facing roles. 826aa88f-b580-455e-841e-7c69210f6a25.description: Warehousing is a integral part of just about every industry Zebra Technologies serves and it is a critical link in the larger world of supply chain. Learners investigate how to elevate the conversation around warehouse modernization. The Warehouse Maturity Model is a strategic framework designed to help sellers determine where their customers/prospects currently reside in their modernization journey, as well as help them develop a roadmap to get to where they want to be.
826aa88f-b580-455e-841e-7c69210f6a25.name: IndustryEdge Warehouse Modernization

badge_template_activities.title: This framework offers a strategic selling approach that helps sellers put customer challenges first to match the right hardware, software, solution or service to their needs. Learners navigate a five-phase framework to strategically modernize warehouse operations & enable operators to effectively increase the sophistication of technology & transition from siloed/reactionary operations to predictive & adaptive operations that are continually being optimized for proactive performance improvement.
